summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the 1st Avenue NE/NE 130th Street Signal Project; providing for the laying off, opening, widening, and establishing of First Avenue Northeast and Northeast 130th Street; providing for left turn lanes; providing for wheelchair ramps; providing for signalization; providing for changing and establishing of the necessary grades; authorizing acquisition of certain real property and property rights necessary therefor; and authorizing acquisition by condemnation, if necessary.
